image[TOK_Q_DELIM]https://best-time.biz/.query: image: An image of the item. This can be a [[URL]] or a fully described [[ImageObject]].

offers[TOK_Q_DELIM]https://best-time.biz.query: offers: An offer to provide this item—for example, an offer to sell a product, rent the DVD of a movie, perform a service, or give away tickets to an event. Use [[businessFunction]] to indicate the kind of transaction offered, i.e. sell, lease, etc. This property can also be used to describe a [[Demand]]. While this property is listed as expected on a number of common types, it can be used in others. In that case, using a second type, such as Product or a subtype of Product, can clarify the nature of the offer.

description[TOK_Q_DELIM]Smart watch Smar.query: description: A description of the item.

name[TOK_Q_DELIM]Smart Extreme Ultra Bla.query: name: The name of the item.

ratingValue[TOK_Q_DELIM]5[TOK_Q_DELIM]Ag.query:
ratingValue: The rating for the content.

Usage guidelines:

* Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similar Unicode symbols.
* Use '.' (Unicode 'FULL STOP' (U+002E)) rather than ',' to indicate a decimal point. Avoid using these symbols as a readability separator.
